captions.text:
Beyond the red carpet, Selena
Gomez is making headlines for
her business acumen and personal
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
That is right, Gary. Forbes
and Bloomberg have updated their
profiles on her wealth, confirming
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
her billionaire status. Most of
this net worth is driven
by Rare Beauty, which is
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
currently valued at over two
billion dollars.
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
Interestingly, Gomez told reporters she
finds talking about money "distasteful."
She prefers to focus on
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
the products and the philanthropy
behind the brand.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
Her Rare Impact Fund is
a major part of that,
with a goal of raising
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
one hundred million dollars for
mental health services. It is
a verified fact that she
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
uses her platform for significant
social impact.
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
She has also been very
open about her personal life
recently. This includes her relationship
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
with Benny Blanco and her
health struggles.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
She recently discussed her inability
to carry her own children
due to medical issues, turning
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
a private tragedy into a
public conversation about different paths
to parenthood.
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
It is a pragmatic approach
to fame. Whether she is
executive producing television or managing
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
a global beauty brand, she
remains focused on accountability and
her long-term legacy now.
captions.speaker: A

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Beyond the red carpet, Selena Gomez is making headlines for her business acumen and personal transparency this week.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: That is right, Gary. Forbes and Bloomberg have updated their profiles on her wealth, confirming her billionaire status. Most of this net worth is driven by Rare Beauty, which is currently valued at over two billion dollars.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Interestingly, Gomez told reporters she finds talking about money "distasteful." She prefers to focus on the products and the philanthropy behind the brand.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Her Rare Impact Fund is a major part of that, with a goal of raising one hundred million dollars for mental health services. It is a verified fact that she uses her platform for significant social impact.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: She has also been very open about her personal life recently. This includes her relationship with Benny Blanco and her health struggles.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: She recently discussed her inability to carry her own children due to medical issues, turning a private tragedy into a public conversation about different paths to parenthood.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: It is a pragmatic approach to fame. Whether she is executive producing television or managing a global beauty brand, she remains focused on accountability and her long-term legacy now.
